// Fog shader at start of game

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4x4 matMV;
//   float4x4 matMVP;
//   float3 radius_length;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name          Reg   Size
//   ------------- ----- ----
//   matMV         c0       4
//   matMVP        c8       4
//   radius_length c64      1
//

    vs_3_0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord1 o2
    dcl_texcoord2 o3
    dcl_texcoord3 o4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mul r0.xyz, c64, v0
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    add o2, r1, c3
    mul r1, r0.y, c9
    mad r1, c8, r0.x, r1
    mad r0, c10, r0.z, r1
    add r0, r0, c11
    mov o0, r0
    mov r3, r0
    mov o1, c3
    mov o3, c2

// approximately 13 instruction slots used


// Output adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --adjust=texcoord3 VertexShader_169_CRC32_FF9F1970.txt
texldl r2, c220.z, s0
add r2.w, r3.w, -r2.y
mad r3.x, r2.w, r2.x, r3.x
mov o4, r3
